item.title: Mission Out Analysis
item.description: Disclaimer: The views I express in these writings are my own and do not necessarily reflect the department, college, or university with which I am employed. This post is the start to a series on my views pertaining to curriculum analysis, and my views on the process as it pertains to department-level review. But I must frame the following set of posts before I can proceed. While perhaps insufficient in its explanation, we will use the overview of “Curriculum” as preferred by Wiles & Bondi in their book “Curriculum Development: A Guide to Practive” which I believe shows the breadth of the field:
